wikipedia_page.main: Giedrė Rakauskaitė  (born 13 June 1991 in Kaunas) is a British Paralympic rower who is a double World champion in the mixed coxed four.Rakauskaitė was appointed Member of the Order of the British Empire (MBE) in the 2022 New Year Honours for services to rowing.

link_mentions.page: Great Britain at the 2020 Summer Paralympics
